channel.title: How do I close my account?
channel.description:
I created this account to perform a task and now have finished what I came to do. I could not find an option to close my account. How can I do this?
Thank you

item.title: How do I close my account?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
This was done several days ago already.

Read full topic

item.title: How do I close my account?
item.dc:creator: Patrick
item.description:
As far as I know the discourse webapp which Whonix is using does not provide such a feature to users. See also Privacy on the Whonix ‚Ñ¢ Website. Users usually just stop using their account. What would you like to accomplish?

Discourse has a feature Anonymizing User that I as a discourse forum admin could run on your account. Anonymizing User describe here:

Discourse Meta ‚Äì 7 May 18

Anonymizing Users in Discourse

Did you know that Discourse has had the ability to anonymize users for quite some time? Lately we‚Äôve improved it so the scrubbing involved is even more thorough. How do I anonymize a user? At the bottom of a user‚Äôs admin page, there is an ‚ÄúAnonymize...

Reading time: 4 mins üïë Likes: 152 ‚ù§

Should I do that?

Read full topic
